price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߞߊ߲߫ ߠߋ߬ ߞߏ߫ ߤߍ߲߬ ߸ ߞߊ߬ߥߊ߲߬ߘߌ ߟߊߖߌ߰ߣߍ߲߬ ߌߟߋ ߡߍ߲ ߡߊ߬ ߸ ߌ ߦߋ߫ ߝߊ߬ߕߐ ߖߍ߬ߘߍ ߟߋ߬ ߘߌ߫
arabic: وَقَالُواْ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِي نُزِّلَ عَلَيۡهِ ٱلذِّكۡرُ إِنَّكَ لَمَجۡنُونٞ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: waqālū yāayyuhā alladhī nuzzila ʿalayhi al-dhik'ru innaka lamajnūnun
